org.openhubframework.openhub.api.route

Class XPathValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openhubframework.openhub.api.route.XPathValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.camel.Processor

    public class XPathValidator
extends Object
implements org.apache.camel.Processor
    XPath validator that checks existence of mandatory element values (only those which have text values, not other sub-elements). If there is no specified element (also with any value) then ValidationException is thrown.

    Input XML: 

         <cus:setCustomerRequest>
        <cus:customer>
           <cus1:externalCustomerId>700034</cus1:externalCustomerId>
           <cus1:customerNo>2</cus1:customerNo>
        </cus:customer>
     </cus:setCustomerRequest>
    ParentElm: /cus:setCustomerRequest/cus:customer
    elements: [cus1:externalCustomerId, cus1:customerNo]
    Author:
    Petr Juza
